Sequence Information.Peptide Name: KL6A4 (Synthetic AMPs, Ala-rich, Leu-rich, XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (37.5%) toGNU7L: 46%, A: 31%, K: 23%.Activity: active against Gram- E. coli ATCC25922 or K88 or CVCC 1515 or UB1005 (MIC 1-32 uM), B.pyocyaneum ATCC 27853 (MIC > 128 uM), S.typhimurium ATCC 14028 (MIC >128 uM), S.pullorum C79â€“13 (MIC > 128 uM), Gram+  S. aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC 32 uM), S. epidermidis ATCC 12228 (MIC 16 uM), S. faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC 16 uM), and B. subtilis CMCC 63501 (MIC 16 uM).In vitro toxicity: 5% hemolysis concentration 8 uM.Structure: random coil in PBS and helical in 30 mM SDS.
Literature Information.Author: Li W, Tan T, Xu W, Xu L, Dong N, Ma D, Shan A.2016
Literature Information.Title: Rational design of mirror-like peptides with alanine regulation.
